#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test_case,i,j,sum=0;
    char str[500];
    cin>>test_case;
    while(test_case--)
    {  sum=0;
       cin>>str;
       int a=strlen(str);
       for(j=0;j<a;j++)
       sum+=(int)str[j];
       sum=sum/a;
       cout<<(char)sum<<endl;
       }
       
       return 0;
       }
